type.description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Modify Breeding Cooldown

---


[Power Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/modify_breeding_cooldown)

Modifies the breeding cooldown for entities bred by the power holder.

Type ID: `apugli:modify_breeding_cooldown`

---

### Examples

```json
{
    "type": "apugli:modify_breeding_cooldown",
    "modifier": {
        "operation": "multiply_total_multiplicative",
        "value": 2
    },
    "bientity_condition": {
       "type": "apoli:owner",
       "inverted": true
    }
}
```
This power doubles the breeding cooldown for entities if they aren't owned by the power holder.
type.markdownDescription:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Modify Breeding Cooldown

---


[Power Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/modify_breeding_cooldown)

Modifies the breeding cooldown for entities bred by the power holder.

Type ID: `apugli:modify_breeding_cooldown`

---

### Examples

```json
{
    "type": "apugli:modify_breeding_cooldown",
    "modifier": {
        "operation": "multiply_total_multiplicative",
        "value": 2
    },
    "bientity_condition": {
       "type": "apoli:owner",
       "inverted": true
    }
}
```
This power doubles the breeding cooldown for entities if they aren't owned by the power holder.

modifier.description: If set, this modifier will apply to the cooldown that entities have before they may breed again.
modifier.markdownDescription: If set, this modifier will apply to the cooldown that entities have before they may breed again.

modifiers.description: If set, these modifiers will apply to the cooldown that entities have before they may breed again.
modifiers.markdownDescription: If set, these modifiers will apply to the cooldown that entities have before they may breed again.

bientity_condition.description: If set, the bi-entity condition(s) that must be met with the power holder as the actor and the breedable entity as the target.
bientity_condition.markdownDescription: If set, the bi-entity condition(s) that must be met with the power holder as the actor and the breedable entity as the target.

x-intellij-html-description:
title: Modify Breeding Cooldown (Power Type) date: 2022-02-06

Modify Breeding Cooldown

Power Type

Modifies the breeding cooldown for entities bred by the power holder.

Type ID: apugli:modify_breeding_cooldown

Fields

Field Type Default Description
modifier Attribute Modifier optional If set, this modifier will apply to the cooldown that entities have before they may breed again.
modifiers Array of Attribute Modifiers optional If set, these modifiers will apply to the cooldown that entities have before they may breed again.
bientity_condition Bi-entity Condition optional If set, the bi-entity condition(s) that must be met with the power holder as the actor and the breedable entity as the target.

Examples

{
    "type": "apugli:modify_breeding_cooldown",
    "modifier": {
        "operation": "multiply_total_multiplicative",
        "value": 2
    },
    "bientity_condition": {
       "type": "apoli:owner",
       "inverted": true
    }
}

This power doubles the breeding cooldown for entities if they aren't owned by the power holder.
